title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Guest: Dr. Louisa Williams Dr. <!--more--> Louisa Williams is a seasoned alternative health physician practicing at the Marin Naturopathic Medicine Clinic in San Rafael, California.
She has a doctorates in both naturopathic and chiropractic medicine and a Masters in psychology.
In 1984, she founded the well-known Seattle Health Clinic which specializes in environmental medicine and detoxification.
Along with Dr Dietrich Klinghardt, Louisa co-developed the muscle testing methodology known as Neural Kinesiology, which aids in the treatment of illnesses directly related to dominant foci such as dental and tonsil focal infections and scar interference fields.
She is also the founder of a new diagnostic method termed Matrix Reflex Testing or MRT that includes drainage remedies, auriculotherapy from France, constitutional homeopathy based on the cutting edge work of Dr Rajan Sankaran from India.
Louisa serves on the board of the International Academy of Biological Dentistry and Medicine and is a member of the International Academy of Applied Kinesiology and the American Association of Naturopathic Physicians.
In addition to having authored over 20 teaching manuals, her recent book is “Radical Medicine: Cutting Edge Natural Therapies that Treat the Root Causes of Disease,” a volumous introduction into the far reaching possibilities of alternative medicine for treating diseases and sustaining health.
